name: 高等天氣學
description:
本課程目標在介紹研究所等級之天氣學知識，以了解大氣環流，特別是中緯度綜觀天氣系統之行為。課程內容主要介紹進階之原理與分析方法，以了解並解釋如中緯度氣旋與反氣旋、噴流、鋒面、以及鋒生等現象與天氣系統之演變。同時，本課程也對台灣地區顯著之天氣系統，例如梅雨與颱風進行介紹。除了例行之課堂教學外，本課程包括重要學術論文之選讀與討論，以加強學生未來進行研究之基礎。
The objective of this course is to gain an understanding, at the graduate level, of the observed behavior of the atmosphere, with an emphasis on mid-latitude synoptic-scale weather systems. The more advanced analysis techniques and theoretical principles in synoptic-dynamic meteorology will be introduced, and used to help the interpretation of the structure and evolution of systems including extra-tropical cyclones and anti-cyclones, jet/front systems, and frontogenesis in a diagnostic context. The structure and dynamics of significant synoptic to meso-scale weather systems in the Taiwan area, such as Mei-yu fronts and typhoons are also introduced. In addition to regular lectures, selected research papers from the literature will be reviewed and discussed throughout the course.
goals: 講授進階之大氣運行原理，瞭解天氣系統之發展、演變及其伴隨天氣變化之物理過程，進而驗證天氣變化與氣象預測之學理，並加強學生進行研究之基礎與專業知識。
syllabus:
第一週  General review and useful concepts

第二週  Basic equations and their application

第三週  Atmospheric stability and precipitation processes

第四週  Relationship of pressure and wind fields

第五週  Review of basic kinematics

第六週  Quasi-geostrophic theory and its applications

第七週  Front and frontogenesis

第八週  Extratropical cyclone and cyclogenesis

第九週  期中考

第十週  學生期中論文選讀報告

第十一週  Upper-level divergence and jet stream

第十二週  Potential vorticity (PV) and its applications

第十三週  Tropical atmosphere and tropical cyclone

第十四週  Vertical motion and its calculation

第十五週  Monsoon and Mei-yu systems

第十六週  Energetics of synoptic weather systems

第十七週  學生期末論文選讀報告

第十八週  期末考

methodologies.note: 上課以課堂講述為主，配合學術論文之選讀、報告、及課堂討論。
